github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Follow the conventional commit message format. Use emojis to indicate the type of change, such as '🤖' for AI/LLM changes, '📄' for PDF processing updates, '✨' for new features, '🐛' for bug fixes, '📝' for documentation updates, '🔧' for configuration changes, '⚡' for performance improvements, '🎨' for UI/Streamlit changes. Use multiple emojis for changes to different things. Ensure the message is concise and descriptive and always includes a list of key changes.
